DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether contraceptive counseling is effective on acceptance and use of methods in women following an abortion.
DOC.detailed_description: Contraceptive counseling is considered an essential component of post abortion care (PAC) programmes and it is recommended to prevent unintended pregnancies and unsafe, repeated abortions. Indeed, most maternal deaths related to unsafe abortions could be prevented by expanding and improving family planning provision.
DOC.criteria: Within the first 10 days (plus or minus 5 days) after an abortion Live in Recife or whereabouts in Recife(Brazil) Clinical diagnosis of Gestational Trophoblastic Disease Women HIV positive Psychiatric pathology
